name: Homemade Hanukkah Gelt
description: You don't have to buy stale gold coins —make your own with an apricot-y twist.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup chocolate chips (Whatever flavor you like. I like dark.)

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the chocolate chips slowly in the microwave stopping frequently to stir.
Dip half the apricot in the chocolate and then place on wax paper. (You want people to see the "gold coin" (aka the apricot).
Chill in fridge for about 20 minutes until chocolate hardens. That's it!
Any other Hanukkah recipes you use every year?
